name: ANTIFECTOR (itch)
description:
FPS Arcade game. Play as an antivirus and shoot down endless hordes of viruses. Including 5 levels:

  • Virtual Arena
  • Training Zone
  • Unprotected System
  • Connected Systems
  • Shared Folders

Run to ammo and health packs to replenish your supplies, use the bomb to get out of trouble, survive for as long as you can.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Aiming
  • SPACE - Jump
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • X - Use Bomb

These can all be modified in-game. Mouse sensitivity can also be adjusted. Inverted mouse included. Resolution can be changed from the options menu. Fullscreen can also be toggled on or off.

Get the MUSIC from the GAME:

This game's soundtrack, SENTIENT DATA, can be played and purchased from the following link: 

https://tirsod.bandcamp.com/album/sentient-data

Check it out!
